about_the_game:
Caddy's Tea Service is a cozy, action packed tea cooking simulator!



As a last resort to save your sister who has fallen ill, you take up a contract to work as a tea apprentice under a mysterious cat who owns the worlds best tea service. Operating on a train, you travel across different regions and face treacherous enemies to collect rare ingredients, expand your knowledge to discover a cure. Across these regions you serve customers all around the world and may even find new found friendships, heart warming stories and potentially fall into some perilous adventures. Will you be able to master the arts of combat and cooking? Find out on the unforgettable journey of Caddy's Tea Service.

FOES
Magic energy flows within the train, causing ingredients to manifest into creature that you must prepare to make the most premium tea. However, these creatures won't go down without a fight so be careful as it's not guaranteed you'll make it through your shift.

COOKING
Forget everything you know about traditional cooking, it's time to fight for your ingredients! Utilize weapons such as swords, hammers and more to defeat the ingredient enemies that come your way. Experiment and trial different ways to obtain the ingredients you need to make special recipes. Don't forget to keep an eye on the teas so they don't burn, and try to collect them at the perfect time to get the highest quality tea you possibly can!

ADVENTURE
Travel across the world in a trusty train and experience all the different ingredients each region has to offer. Get to know the locals of these regions, maybe even help them with their dilemmas and most importantly, serve some delicious tea.
